snippet.title: Advances in medical diagnostic technology
snippet.description: Advances in medical diagnostic technology / Lai, Khin Wee This book provides the most recent findings and knowledge in advanced diagnostics technology, covering a wide spectrum including brain activity analysis, breast and lung cancer detection, echocardiography, computer aided skeletal assessment to mitochondrial biology imaging at the cellular level [...] Singapore : Springer, 2014.

snippet.title: Machine learning with R
snippet.description: Machine learning with R / Lantz, Brett Written as a tutorial to explore and understand the power of R for machine learning [...] Birmingham : Packt Publ., 2013. - 396 p.

International Conference on Frontiers of Intelligent Computing : Theory and Applications \- FICTA 2013 14 - 16 Nov 2013 \- Bhubaneswar, India / Satapathy, Suresh (ed.); Udgata, Siba (ed.); Biswal, Bhabendra (ed.) This volume contains the papers presented at the Second International Conference on Frontiers in Intelligent Computing: Theory and Applications (FICTA-2013) held during 14-16 November 2013 organized by Bhubaneswar Engineering College (BEC), Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India. It contains 63 papers focusing on application of intelligent techniques which includes evolutionary computation techniques like genetic algorithm, particle swarm optimization techniques, teaching-learning based optimization etc for various engineering applications such as data mining, Fuzzy systems, Machine Intelligence and ANN, Web technologies and Multimedia applications and Intelligent computing and Networking etc.. Cham : Springer, 2014 e-proceedings

snippet.title: Nuclear medicine board review : questions and answers for self-assessment
snippet.description: Nuclear medicine board review : questions and answers for self-assessment . \- 3rd ed. / Goldfarb, C Complete with more than 2,000 questions and answers, the third edition of Nuclear Medicine Board Review: Questions and Answers for Self-Assessment fully prepares readers for certification or re-certification exams administered by the American Board of Radiology, the American Board of Nuclear Medicine, the Certification Board of Nuclear Cardiology, and the Nuclear Medicine Technology Certification Board [...] New York, NY : Thieme, 2011. - 221 p.

snippet.title: Test Sensitivity in the Computer-Aided Detection of Breast Cancer from Clinical Mammographic Screening: a Meta-analysis
snippet.description: Test Sensitivity in the Computer-Aided Detection of Breast Cancer from Clinical Mammographic Screening: a Meta-analysis / Levman, Jacob Objectives: To assess evaluative methodologies for comparative measurements of test sensitivity in clinical mammographic screening trials of computer-aided detection (CAD) technologies. [...] arXiv:1302.1382. \- 2013\. Preprint

snippet.title: Sodium Magnetic Resonance Imaging: Biomedical Applications
snippet.description: Sodium Magnetic Resonance Imaging: Biomedical Applications / Madelin, Guillaume In this article, we present an up-to-date overview of the potential biomedical applications of sodium MRI in vivo. [...] arXiv:1212.4400. \- 2012\. Preprint

snippet.title: Optimization and Data Analysis in Biomedical Informatics
snippet.description: Optimization and Data Analysis in Biomedical Informatics / Pardalos, Panos M This volume covers some of the topics that are related to the rapidly growing field of biomedical informatics [...] Dordrecht : Springer, 2012. - 199 p. (Fields Institute Communications ; 63) ebook

snippet.title: Modeling and Analysis of Shape with Applications in Computer-aided Diagnosis of Breast Cancer
snippet.description: Modeling and Analysis of Shape with Applications in Computer-aided Diagnosis of Breast Cancer / Guliato, Denise Malignant tumors due to breast cancer and masses due to benign disease appear in mammograms with different shape characteristics: the former usually have rough, spiculated, or microlobulated contours, whereas the latter commonly have smooth, round, oval, or macrolobulated contours [...] San Rafael : Morgan & Claypool Publishers, 2011. - 95 p. ebook

snippet.title: Using data mining techniques for diagnosis and prognosis of cancer disease
snippet.description: Using data mining techniques for diagnosis and prognosis of cancer disease / Kharya, Shweta Breast cancer is one of the leading cancers for women in developed countries including India. [...] arXiv:1205.1923. \- 2012\. Preprint

snippet.title: Machine Interpretation of Patterns : Image Analysis and Data Mining
snippet.description: Machine Interpretation of Patterns : Image Analysis and Data Mining / De, Rajat K This review volume provides from both theoretical and application points of views, recent developments and state-of-the-art reviews in various areas of pattern recognition, image processing, machine learning, soft computing, data mining and web intelligence [...] Singapore : World Scientific, 2010. - 316 p. ebook
